flawed_nl_solution:
Katrina has 85/5 = <<85/5=17.0>>17.0 marbles.
Twice as many marbles as Katrina is 17.0 x 2 = <<17.0*2=43.0>>43.0
Amanda has 43.0 -12 = <<43.0-12=31.0>>31.0 marbles.
Mabel has 85 - 31.0 = <<85-31.0=54.0>>54.0 more marbles than Amanda

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34.0, not 43.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
